definition: a bonus issue (a form of dividend payment)

sentences.english: Some 60% said that saving jobs was more important than paying dividends.
sentences.chinese: 大約60%的人說，保留工作崗位比派發紅利更重要。

sentences.english: A few weeks later they cut me a check. I returned it.
sentences.chinese: 幾周後他們給我了一張支票，我得到了這些紅利。

sentences.english: Believe yourself, everybody, the fund will bring you a plentiful profit. Please support Mr. Liang!
sentences.chinese: 中信紅利太棒了，大家都進來讚美一下樑經理。

sentences.english: Stock dividends are not taxable income to the recipient as are cash dividends.
sentences.chinese: 紅股與現金紅利不同，對收入者沒有所得稅。

sentences.english: A whole life policy can earn dividends.
sentences.chinese: 終身人壽保險可以獲得紅利。

sentences.english: It makes no difference whether dividends are paid quarterly or annually.
sentences.chinese: 紅利按季發放還是按年發放沒有什麼差別。

sentences.english: Development dividend will be the green origination of reginal economical increase in China.
sentences.chinese: 發展紅利將成爲今後中國區域經濟增長的綠色動力源。

sentences.english: There is no withholding tax payable on dividend distribution.
sentences.chinese: 對紅利分配不徵收應收預扣稅款。

sentences.english: Do you use a screener for stocks with high dividends and low payout ratios?
sentences.chinese: 你使用高紅利和低支出比率來選股票嗎？

sentences.english: You can see that your total cash value and dividends accumulate very fast.
sentences.chinese: 您可以見到您的總現金額及累積紅利來得有多快。

sentences.english: You don’t need credit cards for cash-back bonuses.
sentences.chinese: 你不需要用信用卡進行紅利套現。

sentences.english: Article 33 Shareholder shall get dividends in proportion to the amount of investment they have made.
sentences.chinese: 第三十三條股東按照出資比例分取紅利。
一些封閉投資基金還提供紅利。

sentences.english: This provision shall not apply to Trust Funds for which dividends may be declared pursuant to the relevant trust agreement(s).
sentences.chinese: 但對於信託資金依約定發給紅利者，不在此限。

sentences.english: Mexico will also benefit as China's wage advantage declines, BCG predicts.
sentences.chinese: BCG預測墨西哥也將獲益於中國勞動紅利的衰退。

sentences.english: They are discussing how to whack up the profits.
sentences.chinese: 他們在討論怎樣分紅利。

definition: life insurance/abbr. for 人壽保險|人寿保险
